skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy.

Has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

Has a 100% chance instead if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff or a [Freeze] debuff.
skills.name: Brittleness Bane

Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [Freeze] debuff on each target for 1 turn if they are under a [HP Burn] debuff.

Also extends the duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs to 3 turns. This extension cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Elemental Unity

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
